title: POTUS Data
description: POTUS as the acronym of President of the United States is a data showcase of some interesting data of every President of the States.

title: Periodic Table
description: A periodic table where you can see the atomic weight, the correspondent link to the article in wikipedia of the selected element. Also can select and see the group of chemical elements in the whole table.

title: The Movie Database
description: A movie searcher where to see not only movies but also series and celebrities. When a trailer is available is possible to see it.

title: A Wikipedia searcher
description: A multilingual (English, Español, Français, Português, Italiano, Deutsch) wikipedia searcher, that also can show to you a random article in the selected language.
